meanings.definition: A group of three people who share power or authority.
meanings.sent2: The triumvirs ruled the kingdom wisely.
meanings.sent3: The triumvirs tried to agree on what to have for lunch.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the triumvirs of innovation, marketing, and finance must work in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The triumvirs stood united, their combined strength unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of three people who share power or authority.
meanings.sent1: She was a triumvirs in the council.
meanings.sent2: The triumvirs took their seats at the round table.
meanings.sent3: The triumvirs joked about their matching outfits.
meanings.sent4: As a triumvirs of the team, he played a crucial role in decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The triumvirs' bond was unbreakable, their unity unwavering.
